data.title: Dr. Paul Nguyen, Resident Physician
data.meta_description: Find information about and book an appointment with Dr. Paul Nguyen, Resident Physician in Phoenix, AZ. Specialties: Internal Medicine.
data.text:
Care Philosophy

In my role as a resident, I actively contribute to improving patient care through collaboration within a dedicated resident clinic. By closely working with attending physicians, our team approach ensures that patients benefit from a comprehensive evaluation and treatment plan, drawing upon the combined expertise of experienced attendings and enthusiastic residents who are eager to incorporate the latest advancements in medicine.

Banner – University Medicine Family Medicine Clinic takes pride in the excellent care patients receive by combining academic training with faculty physicians. Our Center includes care of children, adolescents, adults, maternity care, women’s health issues, and older patients. We provide preventive care and manage chronic diseases. Family-centered maternity care is unique to our practice. We provide prenatal care, delivery, and newborn care for your baby. Our unique team approach ensures superior patient experience through the delivery of comprehensive, coordinated and accessible care. It would be our privilege to care for you and your family.
